# `Input` Definition

Input component configuration

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the input field |
| title | `string` | No | Title of the input field |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Subtitle of the input field |
| placeholderText | `string` | No | Placeholder text for the input |
| isMultipleLine | `boolean` | Yes | Whether the input supports multiple lines |
| isRequired | `boolean` | Yes | Whether the input is required |
